# Sermon Clips

> AI-powered sermon clip generator. Upload full-length sermons and automatically extract the most impactful, shareable moments for social media and church engagement.

## About
Sermon Clips uses AI to analyze sermon audio and video, identify key moments, generate transcriptions, and create ready-to-share clips optimized for social media platforms like Instagram, YouTube Shorts, and TikTok.

## Key Features

- [Homepage](https://sermon-clips.com/) - AI sermon clip generation
- Automatic sermon transcription
- AI-identified highlight moments
- Social media-optimized clip formatting
- Multiple export formats and aspect ratios

## Use Cases
- Churches creating social media content from weekly sermons
- Pastors sharing key teaching moments
- Ministry teams building engagement through short-form video
- Podcast creators extracting highlights

## Technology
Built with Next.js and AI-powered audio/video analysis.
